errors.name: DivideByZero
errors.msg: Dividing by zero is not allowed

errors.name: UnauthorizedAdmin
errors.msg: Only admin can perform this action

errors.name: UnauthorizedAccess
errors.msg: Only authority can perform this action

errors.name: TooManyBonds
errors.msg: Maximum number of supported bonds reached

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccountOwner
errors.msg: Not the owner of token account

errors.name: ActiveCollateralExists
errors.msg: Bond has active collateral and cannot be removed

fields.name: name
docs: Name of the aggregator to store on-chain.

fields.name: metadata
docs: Metadata of the aggregator to store on-chain.

fields.name: _reserved1
docs: Reserved.

fields.name: queue_pubkey
docs: Pubkey of the queue the aggregator belongs to.

fields.name: oracle_request_batch_size
docs: CONFIGS
Number of oracles assigned to an update request.

fields.name: min_oracle_results
docs: Minimum number of oracle responses required before a round is validated.

fields.name: min_job_results
docs: Minimum number of job results before an oracle accepts a result.

fields.name: min_update_delay_seconds
docs: Minimum number of seconds required between aggregator rounds.

fields.name: start_after
docs: Unix timestamp for which no feed update will occur before.

fields.name: variance_threshold
docs: Change percentage required between a previous round and the current round. If variance percentage is not met, reject new oracle responses.

fields.name: force_report_period
docs: Number of seconds for which, even if the variance threshold is not passed, accept new responses from oracles.

fields.name: expiration
docs: Timestamp when the feed is no longer needed.

fields.name: consecutive_failure_count
docs: Counter for the number of consecutive failures before a feed is removed from a queue. If set to 0, failed feeds will remain on the queue.

fields.name: next_allowed_update_time
docs: Timestamp when the next update request will be available.

fields.name: is_locked
docs: Flag for whether an aggregators configuration is locked for editing.

fields.name: crank_pubkey
docs: Optional, public key of the crank the aggregator is currently using. Event based feeds do not need a crank.

fields.name: latest_confirmed_round
docs: Latest confirmed update request result that has been accepted as valid.

fields.name: current_round
docs: Oracle results from the current round of update request that has not been accepted as valid yet.

fields.name: job_pubkeys_data
docs: List of public keys containing the job definitions for how data is sourced off-chain by oracles.

fields.name: job_hashes
docs: Used to protect against malicious RPC nodes providing incorrect task definitions to oracles before fulfillment.

fields.name: job_pubkeys_size
docs: Number of jobs assigned to an oracle.

fields.name: jobs_checksum
docs: Used to protect against malicious RPC nodes providing incorrect task definitions to oracles before fulfillment.

fields.name: authority
docs: The account delegated as the authority for making account changes.

fields.name: history_buffer
docs: Optional, public key of a history buffer account storing the last N accepted results and their timestamps.

fields.name: previous_confirmed_round_result
docs: The previous confirmed round result.

fields.name: previous_confirmed_round_slot
docs: The slot when the previous confirmed round was opened.

fields.name: disable_crank
docs: Whether an aggregator is permitted to join a crank.

fields.name: job_weights
docs: Job weights used for the weighted median of the aggregator's assigned job accounts.

fields.name: creation_timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when the feed was created.

fields.name: resolution_mode
docs: Use sliding window or round based resolution
NOTE: This changes result propogation in latest_round_result

fields.name: _ebuf
docs: Reserved for future info.

fields.name: num_success
docs: Maintains the number of successful responses received from nodes.
Nodes can submit one successful response per round.

fields.name: num_error
docs: Number of error responses.

fields.name: is_closed
docs: Whether an update request round has ended.

fields.name: round_open_slot
docs: Maintains the `solana_program::clock::Slot` that the round was opened at.

fields.name: round_open_timestamp
docs: Maintains the `solana_program::clock::UnixTimestamp;` the round was opened at.

fields.name: result
docs: Maintains the current median of all successful round responses.

fields.name: std_deviation
docs: Standard deviation of the accepted results in the round.

fields.name: min_response
docs: Maintains the minimum node response this round.

fields.name: max_response
docs: Maintains the maximum node response this round.

fields.name: oracle_pubkeys_data
docs: Pubkeys of the oracles fulfilling this round.

fields.name: medians_data
docs: Represents all successful node responses this round. `NaN` if empty.

fields.name: current_payout
docs: Current rewards/slashes oracles have received this round.

fields.name: medians_fulfilled
docs: Keep track of which responses are fulfilled here.

fields.name: errors_fulfilled
docs: Keeps track of which errors are fulfilled here.

fields.name: data
docs: The bytes used to derive the hash.

fields.name: mantissa
docs: The part of a floating-point number that represents the significant digits of that number, and that is multiplied by the base, 10, raised to the power of scale to give the actual value of the number.

fields.name: scale
docs: The number of decimal places to move to the left to yield the actual value.
